and I open porst in my router
but when I add it to he transmission it said it is closed
ensure your using the right ip address
alt-f2 type 'gnome-terminal' and from there type '/sbin/ifconfig/'
or you can type "ifconfig | grep -b1 eth | grep addr: | awk '{ print $3 }'"
ok, so press the alt key on your keyboard, and press the f2 key on the top of your keyboard
a little box should appear, within there type 'gnome-terminal'
when you click ok, a white box called a terminal will show up
and in that terminal type, or copy and paste this ---> ifconfig | grep -b1 eth | grep addr: | awk '{ print $3 }'
that should be your ip address
